name: Office Nightmare Chapter 1
description: You are working as an office worker and you just finished your work late when everyone left except you, then when you try to leave you realize that your boss trapped you in your office so you need to find a way out by solving puzzles, exploring the place, fight monsters, finding keys, reveal the truth about the place to world and destroy it, stop the evil plans of the owner behind the plans, this game is constantly updated by continuing the story, fixing bugs, making the game look better visually
